post.summary: Authenticate a user and get a JWT token

get.summary: List all projects accessible to user

post.summary: Create a new project. Note: this also registers the user as a maintainer.

get.summary: Get a project by ID. If includeDocuments is true, also include document IDs and names.

post.summary: Add a user as a reader to the project

delete.summary: Remove a user's reader access from the project

post.summary: Add a user as a writer to the project

delete.summary: Remove a user's writer access from the project

post.summary: Add a user as a maintainer to the project

delete.summary: Remove a user's maintainer access from the project

post.summary: Create a new document for a project.

get.summary: Get a document by ID. If includeBody is true, also includes all layers with data.

post.summary: Create a new text for a document.
Create a new text layer for a project.

get.summary: Get a text layer by ID.

post.summary: Shift a text layer's order within the project.

put.summary: Set a configuration value for a layer in a editor namespace. Good for storing data useful for

delete.summary: Remove a configuration value for a layer in a editor namespace

get.summary: Get a token layer by ID.

put.summary: Set a configuration value for a layer in a editor namespace. Good for storing data useful for

delete.summary: Remove a configuration value for a layer in a editor namespace

post.summary: Create a new token in a token layer.

patch.summary: Update a token's extent and/or precedence.

post.summary: Create a new span in a span layer.

get.summary: Get a span layer by ID.

put.summary: Set a configuration value for a layer in a editor namespace. Good for storing data useful for

delete.summary: Remove a configuration value for a layer in a editor namespace

put.summary: Update the source span of a relation.
Update the target span of a relation.

get.summary: Get a relation layer by ID.

put.summary: Set a configuration value for a layer in a editor namespace. Good for storing data useful for

delete.summary: Remove a configuration value for a layer in a editor namespace

get.summary: Get audit log for a project
Get audit log for a document
Get audit log for a user's actions
